constraint: The total amount of water used for liquid and foam hand sanitizers must not exceed the total water available
The total amount of alcohol used for liquid and foam hand sanitizers must not exceed the total alcohol available
The number of foam hand sanitizers produced must be greater than the number of liquid hand sanitizers produced
The number of liquid hand sanitizers produced must not exceed the maximum allowed production limit
The number of liquid hand sanitizers produced must be non-negative
The number of foam hand sanitizers produced must be non-negative
